document_data.name: Magnesium
document_data.mainbody: '''Magnesium''' was a volatile metal found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Properties: Magnesium was a very light substance and weighed only {{SI|110|pound|k|long=yes}} per {{SI|1|cubic foot|l|long=yes}}.

Availability.Occurrence: Magnesium was found in [[Wikipedia:Dolomite|dolomite]] ore.{{Cite dragon/13/How Heavy Is My Giant|6}} More pure deposits were considered extremely dangerous to encounter while mining, similar to digging into [[rock oil]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Building the Pyre|15}}
